name: Mom - Vacuum - Panic
description:
A game made for the 2019 Global Game Jam at UC Irvine.

You play as a kid who has been told by your mother to clean the house because guests are arriving soon. You have limited time so you better get started quick!

Controls:

WASD - To move

[ - To throw garbage/clothes

]  + WASD - To clean

Credits: 

Ace Lowder - Programmer

Brenda Rendon - Artist 

Christopher Jabs - Programmer

Ryan Mauldin - Artist

Wiwin Wijaya - Programmer

Originally uploaded at: 

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/mom-vacuum-panic
